 Sharelnfo Project:

WEB DEVELOPER (FULL STACK)
BEEKNIGHTS
01/04/2019 - 01/06/2019
EDUCATION
INFORMATION TECHNOLOGE
Tra Vinh Univercity
2014 - 2018
Graduated 08/2018
EXPERIMENT
- 2 years experiments in web developer.
- Took part in many projects, include Selpy production.
- Knowledge in GIT. Created GIT workflow for a
production project.
- Knowledge in server administrator (Build, Deploy,
Manage,..).
- Experiment in Full Stack Web Developer (Able to develop
a full stack project by myself).
- Learn Vuejs in 1 week then apply to a project. After 6
months have created an Laravel-Vuejs-SPA core.
- Can work with web SPA (Single Page Application) and
PWA (Progressive Web App).
